overview: Ben is a designer and front-end developer with over ten years of experience in digital media. Most recently, Ben co-founded Radiuus.com, a web and mobile-platform for dynamically connecting users around geographical locations. He also founded Wide Eye Creative in 2007, a NYC-based web design and development studio. Under Ben’s direction, Wide Eye Creative built a clientele of hundreds of clients around the United States and abroad, producing projects for the American Cancer Society, Benjamin Moore Paints, the United Nations and countless political campaigns, non-profits and small to mid-sized businesses. Prior to that, he was a producer of Award-winning PBS documentaries and also worked as a professional photographer. He holds a BA from Vassar College.
